entry.title: 0.9.2rc2 tagged, gitian builds needed
entry.summary: On Friday, Wladimir announced the tagging of 0.9.2rc2 which includes fixes compared to 0.9.2rc1 such as cwallet init fix, upgrading OpenSSL to 1.0.1h, and using pnode->nLastRecv as sync score. While Wladimir has not seen any new problems reported, more gitian builds are still needed before the final release of 0.9.2 at the end of this week.
